channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Mike Lee Spreads False Rumor Of Biden Medical Emergency
item.description: Sen. Mike Lee (R-UT) spread a false rumor that Biden had a medical emergency on Friday night aboard Air Force One.

item.title: Flashback: When Harry Reid was Right about Immigration
item.description: Just shy of 30 years ago, FAIR found what now seems to be an unlikely ally in The Los Angeles Times opinion page. On August 10, 1994, the late Sen. Harry Reid (D-Nevada) wrote a fantastic op-ed promoting his bill to slash legal immigration by two thirds, from approximately 1 million to 325,000. To read [...] The post Flashback: When Harry Reid was Right about Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Refuses To Do Same Interview With George Stephanopoulos That Biden Did
item.description: President Joe Biden sat for a no-holds barred 22 minute interview with George Stephanopoulos that Donald Trump refused to do.

item.title: Massachusetts Governor Maura Healy’s Charade at the Southern Border
item.description: Things are pretty dire in the illegal alien sanctuary Bay State. As FAIR’s 2023 report showed, 393,000 illegal aliens and their U.S.-born children live in Massachusetts, costing taxpayers $2.9 billion annually for health care, education, criminal justice, and general welfare. To read the rest of the article click here The post Massachusetts Governor Maura Healy’s Charade at the Southern Border appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Democratic Senators Are Now Leaking To The Media To Push Biden Out
item.description: Sen. Mark Warner (D-VA) is trying to assemble a group of Democratic Senators to convince Biden to quit according to an anonymous source.

item.title: Mayorkas Lies to the American People During Arizona Visit
item.description: Recently impeached Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas visited Tucson, Arizona, and attempted to sell President Biden’s recent executive action as having worked to reduce the number of illegal crossings at the southern border. To read the rest of the article click here The post Mayorkas Lies to the American People During Arizona Visit appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Biden Vows To Send Trump Into Political Exile
item.description: At his rally in Wisconsin, President Biden vowed to send Trump into political exile by beating him in November.

item.title: Sanctuary Politicians Need to Stop Lying and Admit the Obvious
item.description: Sanctuary politicians are getting nervous, and understandably so. The public is outraged over the surge of high-profile crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens including the recent murder of 12-year old Jocelyn Nungaray in Houston, the sexual assault of a 13-year-old girl in New York City, and the Maryland rape and murder of Rachel Morin, mother [...] The post Sanctuary Politicians Need to Stop Lying and Admit the Obvious appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Biden Declares That He Is Staying In The Race And Will Beat Trump
item.description: President Biden had a message for Democrats who are trying to push him out of the race. The President said that he is staying in, and will beat Trump.

item.title: White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens
item.description: Over the past two weeks, Americans have seen numerous stories about horrific crimes allegedly committed by illegal aliens. The White House commented on two cases but failed to mention a key fact. To read the rest of the article click here The post White House Leaves Out Key Fact in Statements on Alleged Murders of Americans by Illegal Aliens appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
